TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVbcHostObject implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost

summary.span: Defines an interface that allows the [Vbc](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3) task to communicate with the host integrated development environment (IDE).

span.span: Defines an interface that allows the [Vbc](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3) task to communicate with the host integrated development environment (IDE).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面可讓`Vbc`工作來委派專案編譯成 IDE，而不是使用命令列編譯器。This interface allows the `Vbc` task to delegate project compilation to the IDE rather than using command line compilers.
